forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High -3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low near 15F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to rain overnight. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Peeks of sunshine later. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
